## Functions

### getRetComponentType() {#a0f3bc601438bcf1aae3e94056456fec1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Type &#42; getRetComponentType (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42; F, unsigned Idx)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns the sub-type a function will return at a given Idx.

Should correspond to the result type of an ExtractValue instruction executed with just that one Idx (i.e. only top-level structure is considered).

Definition at line <a href="#l00353">353</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp">DeadArgumentElimination.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### numRetVals() {#a7bd47d3b8ac5817cc34bad072b48cf7d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static unsigned numRetVals (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42; F)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Convenience function that returns the number of return values.

It returns 0 for void functions and 1 for functions not returning a struct. It returns the number of struct elements for functions returning a struct.

Definition at line <a href="#l00339">339</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp">DeadArgumentElimination.cpp</a>.

<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass deletes dead arguments from internal functions.  Dead argument</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// elimination removes arguments which are directly dead, as well as arguments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only passed into function calls as dead arguments of other functions.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pass also deletes dead return values in a similar way.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass is often useful as a cleanup pass to run after aggressive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// interprocedural passes, which add possibly-dead arguments or return values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If this is an function that takes a ... list, and if llvm.vastart is never</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// called, the varargs list is dead for the function.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure that the function is only directly called.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.hasAddressTaken())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t touch naked functions. The assembly might be using an argument, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// otherwise rely on the frame layout in a way that this analysis will not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// see.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.hasFnAttribute(Attribute::Naked)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Okay, we know we can transform this function if safe.  Scan its body</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// looking for calls marked musttail or calls to llvm.vastart.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BasicBlock &amp;BB : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Instruction &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CallInst &#42;CI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;CallInst&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst/#ad3c897ba734b78e973db4622dff7bdcb">isMustTailCall</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IntrinsicInst &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;IntrinsicInst&gt;</a>(CI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;getIntrinsicID() == Intrinsic::vastart)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we get here, there are no calls to llvm.vastart in the function body,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remove the &quot;...&quot; and adjust all the calls.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start by computing a new prototype for the function, which is the same as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the old function, but doesn&#39;t have isVarArg set.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NF-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a14b02db913559954c4d38ed70cd66f59">splice</a>(NF-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a88a5e60837674780a9d812d661897ac5">begin</a>(), &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop over the argument list, transferring uses of the old arguments over to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the new arguments, also transferring over the names as well.  While we&#39;re</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at it, remove the dead arguments from the DeadArguments list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a1c9f2f058966db1f8ca270398bda8362">Function::arg&#95;iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.arg&#95;begin(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.arg&#95;end(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              I2 = NF-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a8bf193a781a92cae52d7f9216d0824f8">arg&#95;begin</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">       <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, ++I2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move the name and users over to the new version.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;replaceAllUsesWith(&amp;&#42;I2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    I2-&gt;takeName(&amp;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clone metadata from the old function, including debug info descriptor.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Checks if the given function has any arguments that are unused, and changes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the caller parameters to be poison instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DeadArgumentEliminationPass::removeDeadArgumentsFromCallers(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We cannot change the arguments if this TU does not define the function or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if the linker may choose a function body from another TU, even if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nominal linkage indicates that other copies of the function have the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// semantics. In the below example, the dead load from %p may not have been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// eliminated from the linker-chosen copy of f, so replacing %p with poison</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in callers may introduce undefined behavior.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// define linkonce&#95;odr void @f(i32&#42; %p) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %v = load i32 %p</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ret void</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.hasExactDefinition())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Functions with local linkage should already have been handled, except if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// they are fully alive (e.g., called indirectly) and except for the fragile</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Checks Use for liveness in LiveValues. If Use is not live, it adds Use to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the MaybeLiveUses argument. Returns the determined liveness of Use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964">DeadArgumentEliminationPass::Liveness</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">DeadArgumentEliminationPass::markIfNotLive(RetOrArg <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           UseVector &amp;MaybeLiveUses) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;re live if our use or its Function is already marked as live.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isLive(Use))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964a8cb9173f3fd92152f18401c8bf8ba21b">Live</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;re maybe live otherwise, but remember that we must become live if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use becomes live.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MaybeLiveUses.push&#95;back(Use);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964af29a24ceeaaae7277109ac9c7a52d958">MaybeLive</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Looks at a single use of an argument or return value and determines if it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// should be alive or not. Adds this use to MaybeLiveUses if it causes the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// used value to become MaybeLive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// RetValNum is the return value number to use when this use is used in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// return instruction. This is used in the recursion, you should always leave</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it at 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964">DeadArgumentEliminationPass::Liveness</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">DeadArgumentEliminationPass::surveyUse(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &#42;U, UseVector &amp;MaybeLiveUses,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RetValNum) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ReturnInst &#42;RI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ReturnInst&gt;</a>(V)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The value is returned from a function. It&#39;s only live when the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function&#39;s return value is live. We use RetValNum here, for the case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that U is really a use of an insertvalue instruction that uses the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#adfebd8c4ae29ccd84c600c1e65d6b807a86408593c34af77fdd90df932f8b5261">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> = RI-&gt;getParent()-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RetValNum != -1U) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/retorarg">RetOrArg</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#abd774f5d3a81e00ffb690f4f5c0c82cf">Use</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a5852130d218f4c275e8194510a9e31dd">createRet</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, RetValNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We might be live, depending on the liveness of Use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> markIfNotLive(Use, MaybeLiveUses);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964">DeadArgumentEliminationPass::Liveness</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964af29a24ceeaaae7277109ac9c7a52d958">MaybeLive</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ri = 0; Ri &lt; <a href="#a7bd47d3b8ac5817cc34bad072b48cf7d">numRetVals</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>); ++Ri) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/retorarg">RetOrArg</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#abd774f5d3a81e00ffb690f4f5c0c82cf">Use</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a5852130d218f4c275e8194510a9e31dd">createRet</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, Ri);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We might be live, depending on the liveness of Use. If any</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Value passed to a normal call. It&#39;s only live when the corresponding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// argument to the called function turns out live.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/retorarg">RetOrArg</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#abd774f5d3a81e00ffb690f4f5c0c82cf">Use</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a9536f679d7b90e4dc0db3510ab67dce2">createArg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, ArgNo);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The signature of the caller must match the signature of the function.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Mark the given Function as alive, meaning that it cannot be changed in any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// way. Additionally, mark any values that are used as this function&#39;s</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OptimizationRemark(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericcycleimpl-h/#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d">DEBUG&#95;TYPE</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ArgumentRemoved&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">               &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;eliminating argument &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ore/#a5ca06dfbc998afac005414d8e9b7c234">ore::NV</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ArgName&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getName())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">               &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;(&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ore/#a5ca06dfbc998afac005414d8e9b7c234">ore::NV</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ArgIndex&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, ArgI) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;)&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;DeadArgumentEliminationPass - Removing argument &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; ArgI &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; (&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getName() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;) from &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getName() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find out the new return value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a> &#42;RetTy = FTy-&gt;getReturnType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a> &#42;NRetTy = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RetCount = <a href="#a7bd47d3b8ac5817cc34bad072b48cf7d">numRetVals</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -1 means unused, other numbers are the new index</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;int, 5&gt;</a> NewRetIdxs(RetCount, -1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;Type &#42;&gt; RetTypes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is a function with a live &#39;returned&#39; argument but a dead return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value, then there are two possible actions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) Eliminate the return value and take off the &#39;returned&#39; attribute on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    argument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) Retain the &#39;returned&#39; attribute and treat the return value (but not the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    entire function) as live so that it is not eliminated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It&#39;s not clear in the general case which option is more profitable because,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// even in the absence of explicit uses of the return value, code generation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is free to use the &#39;returned&#39; attribute to do things like eliding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// save/restores of registers across calls. Whether this happens is target and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ABI-specific as well as depending on the amount of register pressure, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there&#39;s no good way for an IR-level pass to figure this out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fortunately, the only places where &#39;returned&#39; is currently generated by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the FE are places where &#39;returned&#39; is basically free and almost always a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// performance win, so the second option can just be used always for now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This should be revisited if &#39;returned&#39; is ever applied more liberally.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RetTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ae8eaa0b4eeac52a2b2282cb1bfd981ae">isVoidTy</a>() || HasLiveReturnedArg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NRetTy = RetTy;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look at each of the original return values individually.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ri = 0; Ri != RetCount; ++Ri) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/retorarg">RetOrArg</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mipsisd/#a422daf9aa810935178671306b651d69ba366e1eac31eeb1a1892d62ccfc0c8cf8">Ret</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a5852130d218f4c275e8194510a9e31dd">createRet</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, Ri);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a404cb9e3e1fb3992697a27bd58e44a68">LiveValues</a>.erase(Ret)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RetTypes.push&#95;back(<a href="#a0f3bc601438bcf1aae3e94056456fec1">getRetComponentType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, Ri));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewRetIdxs&#91;Ri&#93; = RetTypes.size() - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ++NumRetValsEliminated;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ORE.emit(&#91;&amp;&#93;() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OptimizationRemark(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericcycleimpl-h/#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d">DEBUG&#95;TYPE</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ReturnValueRemoved&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;removing return value &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; std::to&#95;string(Ri);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;DeadArgumentEliminationPass - Removing return value &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   &lt;&lt; Ri &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; from &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getName() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RetTypes.size() &gt; 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// More than one return type? Reduce it down to size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StructType &#42;STy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;StructType&gt;</a>(RetTy)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make the new struct packed if we used to return a packed struct</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// already.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NRetTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structtype/#a18fc4545474c6ebb6f7c547f64f4fb31">StructType::get</a>(STy-&gt;getContext(), RetTypes, STy-&gt;isPacked());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ArrayType&gt;</a>(RetTy) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;unexpected multi-value return&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NRetTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arraytype/#a309fed0882f9d27038ff2df2afed7a00">ArrayType::get</a>(RetTypes&#91;0&#93;, RetTypes.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RetTypes.size() == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One return type? Just a simple value then, but only if we didn&#39;t use to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// return a struct with that simple value before.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NRetTy = RetTypes.front();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RetTypes.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No return types? Make it void, but only if we didn&#39;t use to return &#123;&#125;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NRetTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a6e20e76960d952de088354cbcd14c3ab">Type::getVoidTy</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getContext());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NRetTy &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;No new return type found?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The existing function return attributes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AttrBuilder RAttrs(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getContext(), PAL.getRetAttrs());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove any incompatible attributes, but only if we removed all return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values. Otherwise, ensure that we don&#39;t have any conflicting attributes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// here. Currently, this should not be possible, but special handling might be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// required when new return value attributes are added.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NRetTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ae8eaa0b4eeac52a2b2282cb1bfd981ae">isVoidTy</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RAttrs.remove(AttributeFuncs::typeIncompatible(NRetTy, PAL.getRetAttrs()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!RAttrs.overlaps(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlight">               AttributeFuncs::typeIncompatible(NRetTy, PAL.getRetAttrs())) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Return attributes no longer compatible?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AttributeSet RetAttrs = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/attributeset/#ae8ed437b15a7ca943716e5284a9cb9a6">AttributeSet::get</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getContext(), RAttrs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Strip allocsize attributes. They might refer to the deleted arguments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AttributeSet FnAttrs =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PAL.getFnAttrs().removeAttribute(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getContext(), Attribute::AllocSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reconstruct the AttributesList based on the vector we constructed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ArgAttrVec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() == Params.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AttributeList NewPAL =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AttributeList::get(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getContext(), FnAttrs, RetAttrs, ArgAttrVec);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create the new function type based on the recomputed parameters.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">  FunctionType &#42;NFTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontype/#af8be7844c269f201ebcee1e15048c378">FunctionType::get</a>(NRetTy, Params, FTy-&gt;isVarArg());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No change?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NFTy == FTy)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight">              &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now, remove all dead arguments and return values from each function in</span></CodeLine>
